title: Fremantle adds a splash of colour
caption: Fremantle adds a splash of colour
desc: With the Sydney Gay and Lesbian Mardi Gras now in full swing, and the incredibly popular parade only days away, we’re taking a quick trip to Fremantle instead. That’s where you’ll find Marcus Canning’s ‘Rainbow’ - a nine-metre high and 19-metre long public art piece constructed from nine recycled sea containers, designed to be a universal symbol of hope and inspiration.
copyright: Wide angle view of rainbow-coloured shipping containers in Fremantle, Australia (© Michael R Evans/Shutterstock)
